text: Blaue Wimpel im Sommerwind is an East German documentary film about the meeting of the Ernst Thälmann Pioneer Organization in Dresden in 1952. It was directed by and released in 1952. ==External links== * Category:1952 films Category:East German films Category:German-language films Category:Films whose director won the Heinrich Greif Prize
title: Blaue Wimpel im Sommerwind
